description: This file defines a Python class 'Searxng' that provides an interface to perform various types of web searches (general, images, maps, news, science, videos, etc.) using a specified host and optional search categories. It includes methods for each search type and constructs URLs for HTTP requests, handling responses and errors.

classes.name: Searxng
classes.description: A class that provides methods to perform categorized web searches via a configurable host, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a general web search with a query and maximum results.

methods.name: image_search
methods.description: Performs an image search with a query and maximum results.

methods.name: _search
methods.description: Internal method to construct the search URL, perform the HTTP request, and process the response.
